body:
Sexy character but why make him get molested by a fucking toad? This really kills boners...

Also the faggot beneath me. Listen dickbreath it goes both ways, if you don't like what people say then shut your mouth and leave, without making yourself look like a hypocrite.
Are you even aware of what youre bitching about?.. holy shit what a disgrace complaining about how people are "untolerable"and yet is bitching about what people are doing.
You should take your own advice and ignore. fucking retard.

I love it.  Gorgeous art.  So cool the thing between the boy and the frog.  affectionate frog/boy thing.  really enjoyed this.  Thank you author .... and hey, people, if you don't like erotica with frogs you don't need to say it here..     Anyway, why are you complaining about such a specific kink?  You know it's got an element you don't like yet you read it anyway.
anybody knows where to find more saliva based ones like this one?
It’s drawn really good but why a frog
Ugh I hate toads. The animal is not the problem, it's the bloody effects that make me want to scream my heart out.
好棒。。。虽然不造水影是谁但好香。。。
The art style is good and everything, but the fact that it has a frog on it makes me really uncomfortable
